definition: "piece of wood" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 90), mirror image of 片[pian4]
classifier for strips of land or bamboo, shops, factories etc/slit bamboo or chopped wood (dialect)
lit. the red apricot tree leans over the garden wall (idiom)/fig. a wife having an illicit lover
copper wall, iron bastion (idiom); impenetrable defense
lit. pull down the east wall to repair the west wall (idiom); fig. temporary expedient/rob Peter to pay Paul
pinyin: chai1 dong1 qiang2 bu3 xi1 qiang2

definition: lit. pull down the east wall to repair the west wall (idiom); fig. temporary expedient/rob Peter to pay Paul
pinyin: chai1 dong1 qiang2 bu3 xi1 qiang2

sentences.english: So the Giant built a high wall all round the garden.
sentences.chinese: 於是巨人在花園周圍築起一堵高高的牆。

sentences.english: More guards, carrying six wooden coffins, made their way to a wall on the prison's seaward side.
sentences.chinese: 又有幾個守衛扛着六具棺木朝監獄靠海的一面牆走去。

sentences.english: She stood with her back to him, staring at the back wall of his house.
sentences.chinese: 她站在那兒，背對着他，目光注視着房子的後牆。

sentences.english: If we drill holes in strategic locations, we compromise the load-carrying capacity of the wall。
sentences.chinese: 如果我們在關鍵位置鑽孔，牆的承重強度就會降低。

sentences.english: The soldiers were standing under the castle wall.
sentences.chinese: 戰士們站在城堡的牆腳下。

sentences.english: I got a marriage certificate on my wall.
sentences.chinese: 我得到的結婚證書對我的牆。

sentences.english: Stand up straight, don't lean on the wall.
sentences.chinese: 站立要端正，不可靠牆而立。

sentences.english: Xi'an city wall is an artificial loess slope composed of inner-soil and outer-brick masonry.
sentences.chinese: 西安明城牆是由內芯土和外包牆組成的人工黃土邊坡。

sentences.english: A third floor terrace had a seven-foot privacy wall.
sentences.chinese: 三樓的陽臺上有一個7英尺的隱蔽牆。

sentences.english: The wall was blackened by smoke.
He hammered a tack into the wall and hung the picture from it.
sentences.chinese: 他把一個大頭釘敲進了牆，並且在上面掛了一幅畫。

sentences.english: Behind the wall you are calm and peaceful.
sentences.chinese: 你在牆後，保持了安寧和冷靜。

sentences.english: Three days later, many people went over the wall, we have not encountered rous .
sentences.chinese: 三天後，許多人越過牆，沒有遇到任何事。

sentences.english: Extrusion-pattern wall is a new kind of technique in construction of faceplate rock-fill dam.
sentences.chinese: 擠壓牆技術是面板堆石壩施工中的新技術。

sentences.english: Children's room wall stickers are the primary requirements of environmental protection, followed by the style.
sentences.chinese: 兒童房牆貼的首要要求就是環保，其次纔是風格。

sentences.english: The doors were painted blue to match the walls.
sentences.chinese: 門漆成了蘭色，爲的是與牆的顏色相配。

definition: drawing room (room for arriving guests)/living room/CL:間|间[jian1]
